EmailTemplate.subject: Your Life Flies With You When You Have Ovation Select
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://www.constantaviation.com/]]>
As a business jet owner, staying productive when you fly and maximizing your time in-flight is essential. Long delays, limited connectivity and airline restrictions is why you don’t fly commercial.
Make the most of your flight time and experience the ultimate in cabin connectivity with Honeywell’s Ovation Select ® cabin management system (CMS).
Ovation Select delivers the latest technology for Challenger 604 aircraft still operating a Baker C-series CMS while providing a foundation for emerging technologies.
Ovation Select is more than your next cabin management system – it’s your next step to saving time you simply can’t get back at the end of the day.
Contact Constant Aviation today to learn more about Honeywell’s Ovation Select CMS for Challenger 604.
UPGRADE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Constant-Aviation_Ovation-Select.html]]>
